data.title: Studying in Kalundborg
data.text:
In Kalundborg, you can choose from a wide range of special educations you won't find anywhere else. This is because of the strong collaboration between educational institutions and local businesses, which is unique to our area - we call it the Kalundborg Model.

Kalundborg may not be a bustling metropolis, but we truly believe it is a great place to live! The city offers a comfortable and affordable environment, it’s easy to find your way around, it’s close to nature and you can become part of the ever expanding and developing networks of other students and locals.

If you need help finding your way around student life in Kalundborg, contact the Settlement Team on moveto@kalundborg.dk.

Community and collaboration

The strong collaboration between educational institutions and businesses in the municipality leaves a positive impact on the city's educational offerings. This is achieved through activities such as company visits, project partnerships, guest lectures, mentoring programs, and internships, all of which bring students closer to the industry and potential future workplaces.

The study environment in Kalundborg is truly unique, we know each other, we help each other, and we care for each other. Through you time here you'll have close contact with fellow students, instructors, and local businesses.

The sense of community and cross-disciplinary collaboration makes an education in Kalundborg something special.

What's on offer in Kalundborg?

Best known is The Biotech City, where we cultivate future talents locally in close collaboration with the city's world-class industries.

You can choose from a variety of programs at different institutions, ranging from agricultural schools to universities of applied sciences, engineering schools, Helix Lab, and the architecture school.

Kalundborg is both a biotech city and a burgeoning educational hub with a special focus on biotechnological production and process technology. You can choose from a wide range of programs here and even more are on the way.
